SEARCH
Package com.cy_siao.service

Class RoomService

java.lang.Object
com.cy_siao.service.RoomService
public class RoomService extends Object
Service class that handles all room-related business logic including CRUD operations and management of beds and restrictions.

    • addRestrictionToRoom

      public void addRestrictionToRoom(Room room, RestrictionType restriction) throws SQLException
      Adds a restriction to a room using AND as the default logical operator
      Parameters:
      room - The room who needs a restriction
      restriction - The restriction to be added to the room
      Throws:
      SQLException - If database operation fails

    • addRestrictionToRoom

      public void addRestrictionToRoom(Room room, RestrictionType restriction, String logicOperator) throws SQLException
      Adds a restriction to a specified room with the given logic operator. This method ensures the restriction is associated with the room and persists the relationship in the database.
      Parameters:
      room - The room to which the restriction will be added
      restriction - The restriction that will be applied to the room
      logicOperator - The logical operator (e.g., AND, OR) defining how the restriction interacts with other restrictions
      Throws:
      SQLException - If database operation fails

    • removeRestrictionFromRoom

      public void removeRestrictionFromRoom(Room room, RestrictionType restriction)
      Removes a restriction from a room and updates the database
      Parameters:
      room - The room to remove the restriction from
      restriction - The restriction to be removed

    • getAvailableBeds

      public List<Bed> getAvailableBeds(Room room, LocalDate dateArrival, LocalDate dateDeparture)
      Gets all available beds in a room for a given time period
      Parameters:
      room - The room to check
      dateArrival - The arrival date
      dateDeparture - The departure date
      Returns:
      List of available beds

    • hasAvailableBeds

      public boolean hasAvailableBeds(Room room, LocalDate dateArrival, LocalDate dateDeparture)
      Checks if a room has any available beds for a given time period
      Parameters:
      room - The room to check
      dateArrival - The arrival date
      dateDeparture - The departure date
      Returns:
      True if beds are available, false otherwise

    • isRoomFull

      public boolean isRoomFull(Room room)
      Checks if a room is at maximum bed capacity
      Parameters:
      room - The room to check
      Returns:
      True if room is full, false otherwise
